name: J-1M: Hamster Protection Force (Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam)
name_original: J-1M: Hamster Protection Force (Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam)
description:
A turn/grid based puzzle game. Keep the hamster alive, and full of carrots!

Made for the Ludum Dare 46 game jam.

A game by Sam and Molly.

Inspired by Timothy the Hamster.
